#summary hiddenField(objectName,property)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Builds and returns a string containing a hidden field form control based on the supplied `objectName` and `property`.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *objectName* || string || true ||  || The variable name of the object to build the form control for ||
|| * property* || string || true || || The name of the property (database column) to use in the form control ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- view code --->
<cfoutput>
  <p>#hiddenField(objectName="user", property="id")#</p>
</cfoutput>
}}}

*Related*:

 * [FormHelpersandShowingErrors Form Helpers and Showing Errors] (chapter)
